sentences.en: " But often the underdog gets more sympathy from the bystanders. "
sentences.cn: “ 可是,战败者常常得到旁人更大的同情—— ”

sentences.en: An unbelievable thing happened! Underdog got away!
sentences.cn: 最不可思议事情发生了! “点头狗”刚刚飞了!

sentences.en: B: I do love the underdog story though.
sentences.cn: 不过我确实喜欢看小人物的故事.

sentences.en: Bumblebee: A scout; Underdog type character; Smallest of the team.
sentences.cn: 大黄蜂: 侦察兵; 受欺负型角色; 在团队里体型最小.

sentences.en: But South Korea's status as an underdog is wearing thin.
sentences.cn: 但韩国正逐渐告别弱者地位.

sentences.en: Crowds often feel sympathy for the underdog.
Do you prefer underdog role? - I do. - Is It'smarter at this point?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢居下风者的角色 吗 ? - 我喜欢. - 此刻是不是更加机智?

sentences.en: I give you one underdog, then you gotta swing by yourself.
sentences.cn: 我帮你拉秋千, 然后你就自己荡.

sentences.en: I give you one underdog, then you gottang by yourself.
sentences.cn: 我帮你拉秋千, 然后你要自己荡.

sentences.en: In a stunning upset , the gold medal goes to a remarkable young underdog.
sentences.cn: 令人目瞪口呆的冷门金牌被一匹非常年轻的黑马摘走!

sentences.en: Rooting for the underdog in the tennis championship.
sentences.cn: 为网球锦标赛中处于劣势的队鼓掌加油.

sentences.en: She always identifies with the underdog.
She nearly always pulls for underdog.
She took up the cause of the underdog.
sentences.cn: 她为受迫的人的事业奋斗.

sentences.en: The underdog team scored two surprise goals.
sentences.cn: 处于劣势的一队出人意料地进两球.

sentences.en: When an underdog beats a superior opponent, what's the determining factor?
sentences.cn: 如果输家打败了超级对手, 那是什么因素决定的 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 失败者；受压迫者；斗败了的狗

trans.tran_cn: 失败者，退居下风的人，受压迫者，打败了的选手
trans.tran_en: a person, team etc that is weaker than the others, is always expected to be unsuccessful, and that is often treated badly
